18
19enum roffscale {
20 SCALE_CM, /* centimeters (c) */
21 SCALE_IN, /* inches (i) */
22 SCALE_PC, /* pica (P) */
23 SCALE_PT, /* points (p) */
24 SCALE_EM, /* ems (m) */
25 SCALE_MM, /* mini-ems (M) */
26 SCALE_EN, /* ens (n) */
27 SCALE_BU, /* default horizontal (u) */
28 SCALE_VS, /* default vertical (v) */
29 SCALE_FS, /* syn. for u (f) */
30 SCALE_MAX
31};
32
33struct roffcol {
34 size_t width; /* width of cell */
35 size_t nwidth; /* max. width of number in cell */
36 size_t decimal; /* decimal position in cell */
37 size_t spacing; /* spacing after the column */
38 int flags; /* layout flags, see tbl_cell */
39};
40
41struct roffsu {
42 enum roffscale unit;
43 double scale;
44};
45
46typedef size_t (*tbl_sulen)(const struct roffsu *, void *);
47typedef size_t (*tbl_strlen)(const char *, void *);
48typedef size_t (*tbl_len)(size_t, void *);
49
50struct rofftbl {
51 tbl_sulen sulen; /* calculate scaling unit length */
52 tbl_strlen slen; /* calculate string length */
53 tbl_len len; /* produce width of empty space */
54 struct roffcol *cols; /* master column specifiers */
55 void *arg; /* passed to sulen, slen, and len */
56};
57
58#define SCALE_HS_INIT(p, v) \
59 do { (p)->unit = SCALE_EN; \
60 (p)->scale = (v); } \
61 while (/* CONSTCOND */ 0)
62
63
64struct tbl_span;
65
66const char *a2roffsu(const char *, struct roffsu *, enum roffscale);
67void tblcalc(struct rofftbl *tbl,
68 const struct tbl_span *, size_t, size_t);
69
